text.fr: le service est bien . la nourriture est bien et il y en a pour tous les goûts , mais les prix sont exorbitant et dépasse de beaucoup ce qu ' on pourrait payer dans un hilton en amérique du nord .
text.en: excellent restaurant in every way. very cozy setting, excellent food, very large choice of dishes, beautiful presentation of the plates, large choice of wines. we had a very pleasant evening

text.fr: menus excellent crudités sublime accueille très attentionné dessert à gogo . . . . peut améliorer la carte vins . . . . .
text.en: excellent service. good quality of dishes. I happily recommend. location in a pleasant and secure area.

text.fr: j ' ai aimé la façon de prendre soin du client . la presence des employés de salle à chaque fois qu ' on n ' est dans le besoin , à faire des propositions des plats qui nous ont echappé de vu . vraiment correct ; j ' ai été conquise et je peux vous dire que je reviendrais chaque fois que je me trouverais à yaoundé . merci à toute l ' equipe , bonne continuation et surtout bonne année
text.en: ideal setting with exquisite dishes that will whet your appetite. I strongly advise you to go out of curiosity and come back satisfied.

text.fr: il y en a pour tous les goûts ! continental , anglais , africain , toujours avec des produits très frais et de grandes variétés . personnel absolument charmant et prévenant .
text.en: the welcome is magnificent, the restaurant location is perfect (except the parking lot). their menu is truly killer! ! ! ! ! It's quite expensive but the quality of the food is impeccable!

text.fr: mon séjour a été mémorable . le safoutier est un bon restaurant le personnel est formidable et le menu était riche et varié . toutes mes félicitations .
text.en: I really like this address. we have our habits there, the aperitif at the bar or in the lounge with seating at the table when it's ready, the menu on a tablet, very practical but above all the many suggestions explained by the boss. once at the table we are always delighted with the contents of the plates. Anyway, go ahead. the address is worth the detour.

text.fr: ce restaurant vous propose midi et soir un buffet , alors tous les jours c ' est monotone même si des plats changent . globalement il est de très grande qualité , même si avec le temps les entrées se sont simplifiées service en salle pour vous changer les couverts ou assiette . le plus un large choix de vins aux verres en blanc rosé ou rouge .
text.en: The welcome is very good, as is the service in general. the dishes are well presented and the setting is pleasant. My friend's meat was not cooked very well despite the request to recook it, but for my part it was very good. the prices remain a little expensive I think.

text.fr: ce restaurant manque de quelchose : - de personnes chaleureuse - de musiques et d ' un maître de salle qui invite la découverte ! rien à voir ou revoir ! déçu par le personnel fatigué et non avenant !
text.en: certainly my favorite restaurant in Douala for the quality of the dishes which remind me of the country. the meat is exceptional, the wine cellar excellent. all this has a price but never disappointed

text.fr: superbe déjeuner . service impeccable . sancerre parfait . un vrai moment de relaxation pour qui n ' est pas habitué a l ' effervescence de yaoundé , la tarte tatin à la a mangue est un des meilleurs desserts jamais degustés .
text.en: on paper the suggestions are very attractive, in reality there is almost a one in two chance of being disappointed. Generally speaking, the quality that was guaranteed a few years ago is no longer guaranteed, given the prices charged it is disappointing.

text.fr: j ' ai eu l ' honneur de degusté au paradis culinaire du hilton au brunch du dimanche ! l ' accueil était paradisiaque et le buffet divin ! nous avons passé un moment sublime accompagner d ' une diversiter culinaire ! je vous invite a expérimenté ce moment ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text.en: the welcome is magnificent from the entrance, the staff takes great care. the dishes are very good. I recommend

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: It's always a pleasure to come back to dine in this restaurant: warm welcome, the food is very good.

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: obviously if you like rugby the welcome with the jerseys on the walls and the handshake from the boss, you will feel at home but if you are not a rugby fan you will be a fan of the cuisine everything is taken care of: from the choice of products to their cuisine and their presentation on the plate add a very nice wine list and you will understand that I loved it! I recommend without reservation. nb I recognized all the jerseys except one, it’s up to you!

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: the decor has just been redone, more sober, more chic, but the chef is still as talented and the meats, cheeses, oysters still arrive directly from Rungis: everything is fresh, the meats extraordinary

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .
text.en: a closing meal of a forum. . . a fine and gourmet menu. . . a wonderful jazz atmosphere and quality service!

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .
text.en: the cozy and colorful charm of the restaurant combined with Jérôme's high standards and warm welcome make you immediately attached to this place, the cuisine is exquisite, the waiters courteous and smiling, so if you are also a rugby fan well we are in heaven! ! !

text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !
text.en: a regret however with chicken liver in the Landes salad where gizzards would have better accompanied the slice of foie gras.

text.fr: ma famille et moi étions très satisfaits de la qualité du service , de l ' enthousiasme de marcelle et christelle , joseph et eddy
text.en: French dishes with fresh produce imported by plane (arrival Wednesday evening or Thursday). quality service, wide choice of dishes. quality service . a bar area is also available. All the dishes/desserts at the table were very appreciated.

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .
text.en: rather gourmet restaurant offering good French cuisine. very warm welcome. prices a bit high

text.fr: délicieux repas en compagnie des " marginales " . rien à redire tout a été parfait ! mesures barrières respectées tant par le personnel ( christelle , liboire , jean daniel ) que par les clients . je recommande vivement . rdv le 04 pour le brunch new look .
text.en: We entered this restaurant by chance with African decoration but on the menu, there are dishes worthy of a French gourmet restaurant. only problem: we would like more local products. We will return there but with a better supplied credit card because the prices are quite high for the city.

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: gastronomic restaurant . pleasant, neat and spacious setting. good welcome . has made a lot of progress.

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: I come regularly to this restaurant, the service is impeccable but above all the quality of the menus and dishes are exceptional. a real treat ! ! !

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: excellent meal, beautiful table and beautiful service, perfect welcome, pleasant setting. possibility of parking and vehicle surveillance.

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: for the moment the best restaurant in Douala. friendly and professional welcome, impeccable service, exceptional food, well done, keep it up. Relatively expensive price but the quality is there. . . . .

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: very nice table in a French restaurant in Douala located in a chic district of Nkondo. the chef is French, a rugby fan and the cuisine offered is of very high quality, close to gourmet. impeccable service. not to be missed in Douala. a high quality wine cellar with a worldwide choice.

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: very good restaurant in Douala, with good products direct from Rungis at the end of the week. the leader Jérôme opens the door (thanks Bernard!) to good xv matches and that can end in a scrum; - )

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: what to say . sublime, perfect, the great restaurant in Douala, the price too, but when you love it you don't count. . . the oval refers to the rugby ball! !

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: it's good yes. . . but it's expensive . . . it's expensive yes. . . but it is good ! It’s even very good! by far the best restaurant in Douala, ideal for business meals. run by the pleasant Jérôme whose passion for his work is obvious!

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !
text.en: the boss is passionate about cooking and (rugby, hence the oval) and you can feel it when you come to eat at his place. It's just good and gourmet. from time to time it's good for the eyes and the mouth!

text.fr: mon passage à ce resto fut incroyable par ces amples menus et surtout des déserts à régaler . le service est si accueillant car j ai rencontré une serveuse sur le nom de tata marcelle qui c est occupé de moins quand je voulais quelque chose , vraiment merci aussi à mr clotaire et j ai hâte de revenir .
text.en: high-end products in a refined setting. Despite our late arrival, we were given a very warm welcome. a boss who is available and knows how to advise you. an exceptional tuna caught overnight as a starter and a fillet of beef as a main course make for a gourmet and refined meal. worth a detour if you go to Douala

text.fr: service excellent . marie la meilleure et mr . ibrahim aussi . plat de résistance moins n fournit vous pouvez faire mieux .
text.en: very refined and sophisticated cuisine. the boss is really friendly and is passionate about cooking. follow his opinion in general. quite high prices

text.fr: le service est performant . c ’ est un endroit paisible paisible le serveur clotaire est disponible et n ’ hésite pas à répondre à toutes mes préoccupations
text.en: very nice restaurant in a pleasant and chic setting, the food is good, very fine with careful presentation. the service is provided with quality staff.

text.fr: le service est excellent . c ' est un endroit original pour la détente et pour manger en famille . les serveurs sont toujours disponibles .
text.en: superb setting, quality menu with products reflecting the image of the restaurant. here it is refinement, modernity and well presented, fast and quality service. It is not for nothing that many expatriates from Douala have made it their favorite restaurant.

text.fr: détendu , paisible pour manger , discuter , cadre détendu , convivial , et très bon service par mr clotaire .
text.en: l'ovalie offers modern and refined cuisine. beautiful presentation of the dishes and very pleasant setting. The portions are correct but big eaters may find them a little light. the service is professional and courteous.

text.fr: excellent de leopold . . . très bonne ambiance familiale . . . a faire a refaire . . . . la fontaine chocolat était tip top
text.en: very warm welcome, food that lives up to the reputation, well presented and well served. enough space so that conversations from one table to another do not collide.

text.fr: je suis passé au hiltonyaoundé au resto le safoutier à l ' accueil une damme très serviable et pour le
text.en: still as good . starting with a foie gras cooked by the chef and then a steak remarkable for its tenderness and taste.

text.fr: super moment passé au restaurant le safoutier . christelle et rehab ont été très gentilles et nous ont très bien accompagné durant ce moment . merci encore
text.en: nice rugby-oriented setting and the staff is very professional. In addition to the menu, the chef offers varied suggestions such as filled prawns with avocado or roast prawns. the presentation of the dishes is really top and the quality is exceptional, a must-see restaurant in Douala worthy of the best international restaurants

text.fr: soirée très conviviale avec une musique très douce . l . acceuil très chaleur de christelle et rahab . je pense que je reviendrai
text.en: friendly setting attentive boss and very polite staff we had oysters and a duo of house smoked salmon entrecôtes from France and a good dessert everything was sublime a very small problem the meat was already salty I don't like salt but nothing to say . go there with good heart and good appetite

text.fr: très bon accueil , l ' hôtesse adelina toujours souriante et vraiment professionnelle . service impeccable avec un personnel toujours proche .
text.en: Nice restaurant, with original dishes, quite oriented towards France. friendly welcome, and fairly high prices

text.fr: super déjeuner ! un buffet avec plein de choix , un accueil au top , les employés étaient au petit soin , surtout léopold , marie , et christelle . je reviendrais ! ! merci à tous
text.en: very pleasant setting friendly atmosphere and professional welcome in addition to the setting the menu is varied and the tasty dishes good cuisine well presented from the starter to the desert unmissable table in Douala

text.fr: très bon buffet le dimanche . les serveurs sont très accueillants , en particulier sylvianne et christelle .
text.en: considered one of the best restaurants in Douala, we were a little disappointed with the dishes even if the wine by the glass was excellent. the chef welcomes you cordially and offers you the daily specials which are good. on the other hand, avoid the kouing aman, it has no taste and the cannelets are tiny! ! ! the prices are not worth the dishes offered.

text.fr: accueil hors du commun de solange staff très professionnel repas très variés plats local très apprécié j aime aussi la barbe a papa la musique dans l ensemble c est super merci
text.en: This is the Douala restaurant with a very nice and varied menu, but above all the welcome from the chef and restaurateur is absolutely charming. everything is perfect, the restaurant, the welcome, the dishes, the wines. just one piece of advice, go for it! ! !

text.fr: service de qualité , bon accueil et plats délicieux , musique au top ! ! ! merci à rahab pour la disponibilité !
text.en: I come back regularly to Cameroon and to invite my clients or to please myself, the oval is a sure value! ! local or international products, ingenious flavor pairings!

text.fr: belle découverte culinaire ! je me suis régalée . les plats étaient variés et délicieux par la même occasion .
text.en: very generous plate and the only excellent French cuisine in Douala. you get what you pay for. Very very pleasant boss and employees.

text.fr: se commentaire est adressé aux clients du hilton connaisez vous les conditions dans les dans les quelle travail le personnel du hilton ?
text.en: I went to this restaurant 3 times in a row in the same week. I was therefore able to appreciate and get a good idea of ​​this establishment. Each time, we were very well received and the manager of the establishment is always present which makes me say that it is taken seriously. the dishes are perfect with a large choice and especially dishes off the beaten track. the staff lives up to expectations and the service is fast. in short, a beautiful place to invite your business partners but also, without a doubt, to spend a good evening with family if that is the case for you.

text.fr: excellentaccueil de solange tres attentive elle est au top elle maitrise son boulot rien a redire sur la qualite du repas
text.en: with Jerome everything is fine. If you want to eat oysters or other exotic products (made in France) from Douala, this is the place to go. everything is fresh because Jérôme and his wife have put in place precise logistics to satisfy the desires of their most demanding customers. a good address in Douala with a chef who will come and present the menu to you upon your arrival. simple and nice people. in the top ! ! !

text.fr: la bouffe est excellente et l ' accueil est cordial . la musique est un peu trop forte et gêne la conversation .
text.en: I regularly dine at l'ovalie during my missions in Douala. the menu is varied, often with fish of the day; during my last visit I was able to taste an excellent bluefin tuna tartare caught the day before, wonderfully prepared. the dishes are beautifully presented and the service is professional. very friendly boss.

text.fr: accueil chaleureux de solange bon service dans l ensemble millieu chaleureux très apprécié et recommandé à tous pour moi c est le top merci pour le staff
text.en: the reputation of this restaurant is certainly made apart from the setting, the disappointment in the plate, very expensive for what we are offered.

text.fr: très bel accueil de solange service de qualité de mari louise staff convivial repas somptueux prompte réaction de tous et toutes
text.en: l'ovalie offers mainly French cuisine, the French chef offers his suggestions and comes to your table during the aperitif (without indicating the prices), beautiful spectacle, but when you receive the bill at the end of the meal, it's a “gulps” assured! the products are good (imported meat), the cuisine is always very salty, like the bill. . the chef is friendly and welcoming, I recommend you go there for the oysters, it's the only place in Douala where you can eat oysters almost all year round, the restaurant receives an arrival every week by air flight - France . . . I rate it average for the quality/price ratio.

text.fr: accueil très professionnel et chaleureux . magnifique lieu très beau décor avec un buffet ouvert et un large menu . un personnel serviable et souriant dans un cadre paisible . une cuisine de bonne qualité au goût exquis
text.en: a piece of the southwest in the heart of the city, great performance, it was truly a pleasure. A repeat without hesitation .

text.fr: bel accueil de solange très bon repas varié . qualité du service : très poli et souriante . j ’ ai très apprécié et je pense que j ’ y reviendrai encore . vraiment merci
text.en: we feel good there and the team is top notch, excellent food and welcome that lives up to the reputation of the establishment. the suggestions are varied and the boss is always ready to offer you a dream, I recommend the “special” duck breast, ask Jérôme. . . .

text.fr: très attrayant . les servantes sont serviable et surtout respectueuse des choses . bien de choses à vo
text.en: It's a good restaurant, every time I've been there I've loved the food. and the boss is very far from being skimpy in his dishes

text.fr: très bon périt déjeuner et attention particulière venant de clotaire qui était vraiment très serviable et aimable
text.en: nowhere else in Cameroon is such care taken in the presentation of dishes and the quality of products. expensive in the evening and very interesting menu at lunchtime.

text.fr: super petit déjeuner avec des viennoiseries parfaites . le tout dans un hôtel agréable avec un personnel aux petits soins et plein de bonne humeur .
text.en: Jerome the chef knows how to introduce us to new flavors. regular arrival of fresh products. The frame is very nice

text.fr: cuisine de très bonne qualite , variee , bon service de l ' ensemble du personnel et surtout de marie louise .
text.en: gourmet dinner, excellent meal, with à la carte service. . . the price is high, but remains in line with the whole.

text.fr: tres tres acceuillante et sourriente l hotesse au nom de solange les mots me manquent pour decrire la beaute des desserts c est ce qu il faut pour un 5 etoiles de luxe merci encore
text.en: This is great cuisine, the dishes are careful, well harmonized, a feast for the eyes, the taste buds and the sense of smell but a huge sacrifice for the pockets, there your pockets will already cry upon entry, but the restaurant has its charm

text.fr: qualité des repas et service impeccables . les plats sont très copieux . merci à ivan pour sa gentillesse et son sourire .
text.en: Western choices are there. lots of delicious dishes of terrestrial or marine origin.

text.fr: buffet du 13 février au safoutier . excellent comme d habitude surtout les entrées et le dessert ainsi que le jus de fruit naturel . excellent service par marie louise qui était toujours à l ' écoute . bon souvenir
text.en: It was good, it is no longer in my top list of restaurants in Douala but it is still close. . . the setting is nice but the plates are no longer as beautiful and appetizing as before. . . I had lunch there one afternoon and it was very sad. . . . but hey the meal was ok +. . . . .

text.fr: le buffet du dimanche est super bon . rien à redire . la table des entrées fait rêver . celle des desserts fait grossir a vue d ' oeil et les plats chauds sont de bonne qualite .
text.en: dinner: beautiful setting, calm atmosphere, warm welcome from the owner and chef (French), excellent behavior by the waiters. . . a good tasting moment where I will definitely come back!

text.fr: très bon accueil un personnels souriants et attentif un buffet digne de ce nom nous avons adoré merci
text.en: ok but too expensive. However, the room had the smell of a closed cellar. . This is what ruined our restaurant moment.

text.fr: bel accueil , une très bonne ambiance , un personnel très émable et un buffet à couper le souffle et très delicieux
text.en: Very warm welcome, nice wine list, very good service, decent decor. for matches in my opinion screen too small. normal addition for Douala

text.fr: c est un joyau caché parfait pour un dîné un déjeuner c est vraiment somptueux comme buffet l accueil chaleureux par solange merci vraiment je le recommande à toutes personne qui voudrait découvrir
text.en: a first attempt at this establishment frequented by a large majority of expatriates did not make me want to come back. I ate there in a room that looked like a canteen because the noise was so disturbing, in a gambling den atmosphere, the smoke extractor being out of service. a fog of tobacco smoke of all kinds hovered in the room! ! ! ! ! ! ! Okay we are in Cameroon where the smoking ban does not apply in public places but how can we enjoy the food served. These dishes still need to arrive at the right temperature on the table and be tasty! warm lobster carpaccio. . . not to mention that evening the quail legs, certainly farm-raised, but having spent too much time in the breeder's freezers before being "put back on our plates". This is the dessert that excited us the most despite the fact that it does not exactly correspond to the menu. . . In short, I would describe this establishment as very average. I really think that the praise and ratings given to him do not reflect reality. I could even think that the reviews are given by friends. . . not to mention the price which seemed exorbitant to us as the quality of the products was lower. Did the chef taste his quails before serving them?

text.fr: buffet dominical varié , fin et copieux . de nouvelles découvertes à chaque fois . une tarte aux fraises à la frangipane particulièrement réussie ce dimanche .
text.en: excellent cuisine, the menu is varied, the setting is super classy, ​​the welcome is very high quality. we are never disappointed either by the welcome or by the food. the bill is often quite steep, it is better to be prepared, but it is worth the effort

text.fr: très bon accueil , propreté irréprochable et très bonne qualité des produits , serveurs attentionnés et à l ’ écoute
text.en: undoubtedly the best restaurant in Douala. the food is exceptional given the context, however given the prices charged, we did not find a friendly welcome (not to be mean). so over a 12-day stay, we went there once but not twice!

text.fr: restaurant parfait accueil chaleureux merci pour le somptueux repas c est waou ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ça est avec plaisir que je souhaiterai revenir même tout le temps
text.en: definitely a good restaurant in Douala. Everything we ordered was super good with a beautiful presentation. the service is courteous and professional. However, the prices are excessive. . . so much so that my husband had to leave me to go back to the hotel to get money. expect to spend at least 30 to 35,000 f per person.

text.fr: je recommande une fois de plus ce restaurant qui contient un grand buffet et plusieurs variétés le personnel aussi est très accueillant je tien a remercier clotaire , sandrine ainsi que larissa qui font vraiment attention aux client et qui sont au petit soins
text.en: very good restaurant, the best gastronomic restaurant in Douala, but who says the best necessarily means not given 45. 000 f the menu or 70 euros, but if you want a meal from a great chef with a tasting menu to make you salivate you will find it here! little tip you also have a menu but only at lunchtime with starter/main course/dessert at 12. 000 f but only at lunchtime from Monday to Friday!

text.fr: le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet est excellent et varié ( les grands classiques européens et camerounais ) . les amateurs du petit déjeuner typique camerounais ne seront pas déçus : les beignets haricots bouillis y sont très bons . je recommande !
text.en: the epicenter of rugby in Douala. unexpected but very pleasant. the chef produces quality French cuisine and personally ensures the well-being of his customers by providing advice. a good, friendly address.

text.fr: le service est très accueillant , le cadre est confortable et le repas un véritable régal . j ' y reviendrai .
text.en: always excellent, the menu changes frequently, the welcome and the service are efficient, the bar allows you to have a great time before sitting down to eat. what's on the plate is indicative of quality, well-crafted products. what happiness! continue already

text.fr: très convivial . buffet très bon . acceuil parfait . service de qualité . j ' ai vraiment passé un bon moment en famille .
text.en: setting, refined cuisine, cozy and intimate atmosphere, perfect for a candlelit dinner, with a large and beautiful exhibition of tables for the amateur!

text.fr: bon accueil , personnel agréable et professionnel , espace apaisant avec un groupe musical en live et de bon repas locaux et internationaux .
text.en: a very good address, combining traditional European dishes and creativity. beautiful compositions, wonderful flavors. . . the oval is a favorite.

text.fr: décor magnifique , accueil chaleureux et repas excellent c ’ est un lieu adéquat pour des déjeuners entre amis ou d ’ affaire et surtout un excellent rapport qualité - prix . fortement recommandé .
text.en: I dined two or three times at the ovalie. I found the cuisine of the chef, Jérôme, excellent, the welcome and the setting friendly. restaurant of choice for the 'good society' of Douala (mainly expats, the locals being in the minority, at least the times I went there). excellent cuisine for our Western palates, but which may not please your Cameroonian friends (I have had this experience). high prices (if you take wine, count between 50,000 and 60,000 fcfa per person), but given the products worked, this is not surprising. visa card accepted (this avoids having to “carry around” with cash, as is too often the case in Africa).

text.fr: tres bon buffet : belle entrée simple et légère avec sauce bonne organisation et serveurs accueillants et serieux . merci pour l ’ accueil et la propreté , pas de mouches . que du bonheur !
text.en: very good restaurant in Douala, the best. excellent I love eating at l'ovalie.

text.fr: j ’ ai beaucoup aimé les plats camerounais et le service est hyper rapide et satisfaisant . je recommande fortement
text.en: very good restaurant in Douala. warm welcome from the chef who knows how to stir up your wits just by mentioning the dishes. modern cuisine with the price to match, good service. to try, it's a good place for those looking for a little refinement! !

text.fr: un très bon accueil , le petit déjeuner est très bon et les serveurs sont toujours très aimables et accueillants .
text.en: I had a good time . the chef surprised me with an explosive trilogy of scallops. followed by roasted prawns with hibiscus petal butter. and to finish, an excellent dessert farandole. To accompany all this, the boss recommends a South African wine. 1st Grand Cru Nederburg. well balanced. I'll let you form your opinion by coming to discover. good trip. . .

text.fr: très bel accueil par solange convivialité au restaurant très bon plat africain et asiatique star parfait vraiment un seul mot merci
text.en: the chef is charming, the room is certainly the prettiest in Douala, with the beauj. he knows how to cook but a little simplicity in the description of the dishes and their preparation would be welcome. quite expensive and wine list boom boom!

text.fr: accueil super service irréprochable bonne enbiance pointée d une bonne musique pour tout couronner d un bon repas merci encore
text.en: I must admit that I love desserts, and when the meal starts very well, continues averagely, and ends very poorly, the disappointment is great. only one experience, but really don't want to go back.

text.fr: le resto tres conviviale . le personnel accueillant gentil et souriant . merci a larissa et marie louise .
text.en: very interesting place with a particular French ambiance protocol. the menu is presented by the chef and there are daily menus. My family and I were looking for a nice dinner, but we were disappointed with the food. the menu had no vegetarian options (as we are vegetarians) - and what we were served lacked taste and flavor. it wasn't "special". I would not recommend if you are vegetarian.

text.fr: super bien servi accueil tres chaleureux plats très bien fais je dirais excellent encore merci aux staff en particulier larissa , adeline , marcel , dominique , emmanuel , gilles etc . . .
text.en: the first time I eat at l’ovalie. It’s a gourmet restaurant that offers good quality dishes. the restaurant is ok but nothing extraordinary, personally I will install a wooden floor to give a warm atmosphere, perfect for this type of restaurant. Moreover, if you are hungry, the quantity can be small but quality instead of quantity!

text.fr: bonne accueil , très bon buffet très bon service bref excellent de meilleur met traditionnelle le safoutier c ' est juste excellent
text.en: it's a perfect place for lunch, turnaround and variety. the service, food and quality are consistent owner adds a personal touch

text.fr: excellent accuei ( super travail christelle ! - ) l , cuisine variée et d ' excellent niveau des entrées au dessert : bravo ! parfait après une bonne journée de travail
text.en: This restaurant was recommended by some of the Americans staying at this hotel, and we were not disappointed. it's very attentive (especially compared to local standards. a great choice of dsily specialties, which all 3 of us had chosen and each evening was as good as what you can find in a large European city. beautiful presentation, and we had the excellent room for the desserts. The prices were about as expensive as at home, but it is worth it we want to have a very high end in Douala.

text.fr: on a passé un très bon moment . de l ' équipe , au repas à l ' ambiance musicale ! on reviendra . très beau cadre
text.en: located in the Bonapriso area, this pleasant restaurant offers European cuisine, thanks to its talented chef. we went there with their friends and we really enjoyed the food. too bad the air conditioning was rather cold. Then, the price is perhaps the most horrible surprise.

text.fr: le petit déjeuner est impeccable et les serveurs apportent la chaleur au clients vrement il sont a la hauteurs
text.en: We had our dinner here on my boyfriend's birthday and it was much better than I had imagined. the executive chef was very kind and helped me organize a surprise at the end of the meal. the meals were simply perfect. the atmosphere is very relaxing and the decoration is colorful and simply wonderful. the staff was very helpful and kind. the chef was friendly and perfect with suggestions which we tried and really enjoyed. in a word, it's the perfect place to celebrate love

text.fr: l ' argent ne vaut pas la qualité du service rendu . c ' était merveilleux de déguster les mets d ' ici et d ' ailleurs . nous avons passé un moment inoubliable
text.en: I had two meals here, one lunch and another meal. The quality of the food is excellent, and I am particularly impressed by the house made smoked salmon and foie gras. the service is top notch too and the owner is extremely attentive to details. It's not cheap but you pay for the quality and service you get from this great place. a place to have a little pleasure perhaps! ?

text.fr: c ’ est un excellent restaurant qui sait mettre en valeur autant le cuisine camerounaise que celle des autres pays . le buffet est extrêmement varié et les produits sont tous frais .
text.en: we went there with several friends, there was a pre-determined menu with a choice for starters, main course and dessert. the food was really good, the desert maybe a little too mild for my taste buds. . . the manager was very pleasant and courteous. the service is good. the pleasant decoration. . . and then people started smoking. . . and I cut short my lunch with friends to escape the pollution! !

text.fr: très beau moment passé à ce restaurant . j ' ai apprécié la politesse et le professionnalisme des hôtesses . continuez comme ça . merci .
text.en: the food is ok, and an excellent wine choice the owner is very friendly, as are the staff. In total, we were there 10 times in 2 years. From my point of view, the restaurant is overrated, because the quality of the food often doesn't keep up with the price. but in general, fish is excellent, and it is undoubtedly the best choice of meat.

text.fr: je me retrouve ce soir au safoutier yaounde hilton en famille grâce à un concours sur facebook . soirée excellente , le cadre agréable et accueillant , le service impeccable , le buffet et toutes les saveurs proposées juste un délice pour le palais de tous gourmets . l ' orchestre de vrais professionnels de l ' art de la musique , les percussions . en général un avis excellent , merci au safoutier et à tout son personnel et bien - sûr aux bons soins de solange et de rahab .
text.en: we were a group of 10 people for a business dinner. the service was fast and attentive. the food was ok on a world standard, but good for Douala. the wine list was not complete, but worth several French white and red selections.

text.fr: un brunch très appétissant . le cadre est accueillant et convivial . l ' ambiance est très cool . les menus sont très variés et excellents particulierement le dessert . le personnel est super sympathique et nous remercions liboire , sylviane et larissa pour ces moments particuliers .
text.en: the food is good and the cleanliness of the place. The staff was very kind and helpful . I ate shrimp and it's really very exciting when I think about those moments

text.fr: c est avec grand sourire et amour que solange c est toujours occuper de nous je recommande ce restaurant a tous et toute service de qualité liboire maître d hôtel très proactif et son équipe repas très variés merci une rose pour solange merci merci
text.en: the restaurant is really good and therefore very expensive. The food is fresh, well prepared and well presented. It's definitely a treat worth having if it falls within your budget

text.fr: passé le contrôle sécurité , désormais nécessaire partout dans le monde , le hall présente un décor sobre et chaleureux . l ' accueil est très courtois et tout le personnel très disponible . le restaurant , aussi bien en intérieur que dehors près de la piscine , propose une cuisine variée et très bonne ( excellent petit - déjeuner ) . les chambres sont confortables avec une bonne climatisation bien que pas assez silencieuse . bar du dernier étage très agréable avec d ' excellentes musiques .
text.en: We eat here a little and enjoy our visits. extensive menu and daily specials, which are read to you as you have an aperitif (or at the table if you avoid the drink). when it's good, it can be excellent, but sometimes it's really not lacking, which is a shame. the staff is good and the restaurant is nicely decorated. The restaurant often does theme evenings which are very popular.

text.fr: c ' est waouuuu ! solage et clotaire , chapeau vous êtes super ! ! ! l ' accueil est le service sont au rendez - vous . je suis très très satisfait . allez de l ' avant
text.en: in the top restaurants in Douala, this was my 2nd visit. friendly welcome, cocktail on request in a small lounge area. visit to the room, service of rare efficiency from the whole team, especially for Douala, just present as required. excellent starter, special mention for the marlin from the Douala golf course, sinful, smoked, prepared in house. I love the approach. main course, good, lamb, cooked as requested, a little salty, especially the rusti as an accompaniment. dessert, the roasted mango would have deserved to be a bit riper (end of season?), but finish the meal well, the triplet of crème brûlée is great, a bit strong addition, but after months of not being able to return to the country , a bit of good French cuisine was a pleasure.

text.fr: accueil chaleureux par solange et le staff . repas délicieux qui invite a une prochaine visite très très heureux d être encore et encore avec vous mille merci
text.en: of course it's a bit expensive. . . but so much superior to what you can find in Cameroon! nothing to say ! from the welcome, friendly, efficient without being heavy, to the departure with a free digestive. between two varied and really well cooked, good and refined dishes. a breathtaking and stocked cellar (what is on the menu is available, almost miraculous in Cameroon). an efficient and discreet service. a real pleasure not to constantly have a waiter on your back to fill your glass of water! ! ! I really liked !

text.fr: accueil cordial , personnel toujours très sympathique ! en outre le buffet pour le petit - déjeuner est varié et bien fourni .
text.en: the decoration and the boss's very clear comments on the last match of the tournament confirm the name of the restaurant. the menu and especially the contents of the plates make it the best restaurant I have tried in Douala. the plating of the plates is very sophisticated and the taste of the dishes is equally excellent. my carpaccio of different tomatoes and my buffalo steak were faultless. On the other hand, the prices are also above average. for amateurs there is an extraordinary whiskey cellar.

text.fr: salé , sucré , chaud , frais . . . l ' embarras du choix ! les produits sont frais et personnel très serviable .
text.en: excellent restaurant in every way. very cozy setting, excellent food, very large choice of dishes, beautiful presentation of the plates, large choice of wines. we had a very pleasant evening

text.fr: je ne trouve vraiment rien à redire , lorsque j ' ai besoin de me trouver avec des amis ou des collègues pour nous restaurer , dans un coin qui reuni à la fois : un grand professionnalisme du personnel , propreté , le menu tant qualitatif que varié , eh bien je ne cherche pas longtemps , le safoutier est le coin tout indiqué
text.en: excellent service. good quality of dishes. I happily recommend. location in a pleasant and secure area.

text.fr: un personnel toujours très sympa et aux petits soins et une cuisine raffinée ( les gambas . . . ! ! ! ) merci à tous frédéric bard
text.en: ideal setting with exquisite dishes that will whet your appetite. I strongly advise you to go out of curiosity and come back satisfied.

text.fr: le personnel y est chaleureux et prévenant ( j ' ai même pu garder le stylo de l ' une des filles de salle ) ; la nourriture variée , délicate et goûteuse . . . des prix certes assez élevés . mais pour ce standing et cette ambiance très agréable , j ' aime tout simplement ce restaurant
text.en: the welcome is magnificent, the restaurant location is perfect (except the parking lot). their menu is truly killer! ! ! ! ! It's quite expensive but the quality of the food is impeccable!

text.fr: le service est bien . la nourriture est bien et il y en a pour tous les goûts , mais les prix sont exorbitant et dépasse de beaucoup ce qu ' on pourrait payer dans un hilton en amérique du nord .
text.en: I really like this address. we have our habits there, the aperitif at the bar or in the lounge with seating at the table when it's ready, the menu on a tablet, very practical but above all the many suggestions explained by the boss. once at the table we are always delighted with the contents of the plates. Anyway, go ahead. the address is worth the detour.

text.fr: menus excellent crudités sublime accueille très attentionné dessert à gogo . . . . peut améliorer la carte vins . . . . .
text.en: The welcome is very good, as is the service in general. the dishes are well presented and the setting is pleasant. My friend's meat was not cooked very well despite the request to recook it, but for my part it was very good. the prices remain a little expensive I think.

text.fr: j ' ai aimé la façon de prendre soin du client . la presence des employés de salle à chaque fois qu ' on n ' est dans le besoin , à faire des propositions des plats qui nous ont echappé de vu . vraiment correct ; j ' ai été conquise et je peux vous dire que je reviendrais chaque fois que je me trouverais à yaoundé . merci à toute l ' equipe , bonne continuation et surtout bonne année
text.en: certainly my favorite restaurant in Douala for the quality of the dishes which remind me of the country. the meat is exceptional, the wine cellar excellent. all this has a price but never disappointed

text.fr: il y en a pour tous les goûts ! continental , anglais , africain , toujours avec des produits très frais et de grandes variétés . personnel absolument charmant et prévenant .
text.en: on paper the suggestions are very attractive, in reality there is almost a one in two chance of being disappointed. Generally speaking, the quality that was guaranteed a few years ago is no longer guaranteed, given the prices charged it is disappointing.

text.fr: mon séjour a été mémorable . le safoutier est un bon restaurant le personnel est formidable et le menu était riche et varié . toutes mes félicitations .
text.en: the welcome is magnificent from the entrance, the staff takes great care. the dishes are very good. I recommend

text.fr: ce restaurant vous propose midi et soir un buffet , alors tous les jours c ' est monotone même si des plats changent . globalement il est de très grande qualité , même si avec le temps les entrées se sont simplifiées service en salle pour vous changer les couverts ou assiette . le plus un large choix de vins aux verres en blanc rosé ou rouge .
text.en: It's always a pleasure to come back to dine in this restaurant: warm welcome, the food is very good.

text.fr: ce restaurant manque de quelchose : - de personnes chaleureuse - de musiques et d ' un maître de salle qui invite la découverte ! rien à voir ou revoir ! déçu par le personnel fatigué et non avenant !
text.en: obviously if you like rugby the welcome with the jerseys on the walls and the handshake from the boss, you will feel at home but if you are not a rugby fan you will be a fan of the cuisine everything is taken care of: from the choice of products to their cuisine and their presentation on the plate add a very nice wine list and you will understand that I loved it! I recommend without reservation. nb I recognized all the jerseys except one, it’s up to you!

text.fr: superbe déjeuner . service impeccable . sancerre parfait . un vrai moment de relaxation pour qui n ' est pas habitué a l ' effervescence de yaoundé , la tarte tatin à la a mangue est un des meilleurs desserts jamais degustés .
text.en: the decor has just been redone, more sober, more chic, but the chef is still as talented and the meats, cheeses, oysters still arrive directly from Rungis: everything is fresh, the meats extraordinary

text.fr: j ' ai eu l ' honneur de degusté au paradis culinaire du hilton au brunch du dimanche ! l ' accueil était paradisiaque et le buffet divin ! nous avons passé un moment sublime accompagner d ' une diversiter culinaire ! je vous invite a expérimenté ce moment ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text.en: a closing meal of a forum. . . a fine and gourmet menu. . . a wonderful jazz atmosphere and quality service!

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: the cozy and colorful charm of the restaurant combined with Jérôme's high standards and warm welcome make you immediately attached to this place, the cuisine is exquisite, the waiters courteous and smiling, so if you are also a rugby fan well we are in heaven! ! !

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: a regret however with chicken liver in the Landes salad where gizzards would have better accompanied the slice of foie gras.

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: French dishes with fresh produce imported by plane (arrival Wednesday evening or Thursday). quality service, wide choice of dishes. quality service . a bar area is also available. All the dishes/desserts at the table were very appreciated.

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .
text.en: rather gourmet restaurant offering good French cuisine. very warm welcome. prices a bit high

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .
text.en: We entered this restaurant by chance with African decoration but on the menu, there are dishes worthy of a French gourmet restaurant. only problem: we would like more local products. We will return there but with a better supplied credit card because the prices are quite high for the city.

text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !
text.en: gastronomic restaurant . pleasant, neat and spacious setting. good welcome . has made a lot of progress.

text.fr: ma famille et moi étions très satisfaits de la qualité du service , de l ' enthousiasme de marcelle et christelle , joseph et eddy
text.en: I come regularly to this restaurant, the service is impeccable but above all the quality of the menus and dishes are exceptional. a real treat ! ! !

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .
text.en: excellent meal, beautiful table and beautiful service, perfect welcome, pleasant setting. possibility of parking and vehicle surveillance.

text.fr: délicieux repas en compagnie des " marginales " . rien à redire tout a été parfait ! mesures barrières respectées tant par le personnel ( christelle , liboire , jean daniel ) que par les clients . je recommande vivement . rdv le 04 pour le brunch new look .
text.en: for the moment the best restaurant in Douala. friendly and professional welcome, impeccable service, exceptional food, well done, keep it up. Relatively expensive price but the quality is there. . . . .

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: very nice table in a French restaurant in Douala located in a chic district of Nkondo. the chef is French, a rugby fan and the cuisine offered is of very high quality, close to gourmet. impeccable service. not to be missed in Douala. a high quality wine cellar with a worldwide choice.

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: very good restaurant in Douala, with good products direct from Rungis at the end of the week. the leader Jérôme opens the door (thanks Bernard!) to good xv matches and that can end in a scrum; - )

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: what to say . sublime, perfect, the great restaurant in Douala, the price too, but when you love it you don't count. . . the oval refers to the rugby ball! !

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: it's good yes. . . but it's expensive . . . it's expensive yes. . . but it is good ! It’s even very good! by far the best restaurant in Douala, ideal for business meals. run by the pleasant Jérôme whose passion for his work is obvious!

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: the boss is passionate about cooking and (rugby, hence the oval) and you can feel it when you come to eat at his place. It's just good and gourmet. from time to time it's good for the eyes and the mouth!

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: high-end products in a refined setting. Despite our late arrival, we were given a very warm welcome. a boss who is available and knows how to advise you. an exceptional tuna caught overnight as a starter and a fillet of beef as a main course make for a gourmet and refined meal. worth a detour if you go to Douala

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: very refined and sophisticated cuisine. the boss is really friendly and is passionate about cooking. follow his opinion in general. quite high prices

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: very nice restaurant in a pleasant and chic setting, the food is good, very fine with careful presentation. the service is provided with quality staff.

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !
text.en: superb setting, quality menu with products reflecting the image of the restaurant. here it is refinement, modernity and well presented, fast and quality service. It is not for nothing that many expatriates from Douala have made it their favorite restaurant.

text.fr: mon passage à ce resto fut incroyable par ces amples menus et surtout des déserts à régaler . le service est si accueillant car j ai rencontré une serveuse sur le nom de tata marcelle qui c est occupé de moins quand je voulais quelque chose , vraiment merci aussi à mr clotaire et j ai hâte de revenir .
text.en: l'ovalie offers modern and refined cuisine. beautiful presentation of the dishes and very pleasant setting. The portions are correct but big eaters may find them a little light. the service is professional and courteous.

text.fr: service excellent . marie la meilleure et mr . ibrahim aussi . plat de résistance moins n fournit vous pouvez faire mieux .
text.en: very warm welcome, food that lives up to the reputation, well presented and well served. enough space so that conversations from one table to another do not collide.

text.fr: le service est performant . c ’ est un endroit paisible paisible le serveur clotaire est disponible et n ’ hésite pas à répondre à toutes mes préoccupations
text.en: still as good . starting with a foie gras cooked by the chef and then a steak remarkable for its tenderness and taste.

text.fr: le service est excellent . c ' est un endroit original pour la détente et pour manger en famille . les serveurs sont toujours disponibles .
text.en: nice rugby-oriented setting and the staff is very professional. In addition to the menu, the chef offers varied suggestions such as filled prawns with avocado or roast prawns. the presentation of the dishes is really top and the quality is exceptional, a must-see restaurant in Douala worthy of the best international restaurants

text.fr: détendu , paisible pour manger , discuter , cadre détendu , convivial , et très bon service par mr clotaire .
text.en: friendly setting, attentive boss and very polite staff we had oysters and a duo of house smoked salmon entrecôtes from France and a good dessert everything was sublime a very small problem the meat was already salty I don't like salt but nothing to say . go there with good heart and good appetite

text.fr: excellent de leopold . . . très bonne ambiance familiale . . . a faire a refaire . . . . la fontaine chocolat était tip top
text.en: Nice restaurant, with original dishes, quite oriented towards France. friendly welcome, and fairly high prices

text.fr: je suis passé au hiltonyaoundé au resto le safoutier à l ' accueil une damme très serviable et pour le
text.en: very pleasant setting friendly atmosphere and professional welcome in addition to the setting the menu is varied and the tasty dishes good cuisine well presented from the starter to the desert unmissable table in Douala

text.fr: super moment passé au restaurant le safoutier . christelle et rehab ont été très gentilles et nous ont très bien accompagné durant ce moment . merci encore
text.en: considered one of the best restaurants in Douala, we were a little disappointed with the dishes even if the wine by the glass was excellent. the chef welcomes you cordially and offers you the daily specials which are good. on the other hand, avoid the kouing aman, it has no taste and the cannelets are tiny! ! ! the prices are not worth the dishes offered.

text.fr: soirée très conviviale avec une musique très douce . l . acceuil très chaleur de christelle et rahab . je pense que je reviendrai
text.en: This is the Douala restaurant with a very nice and varied menu, but above all the welcome from the chef and restaurateur is absolutely charming. everything is perfect, the restaurant, the welcome, the dishes, the wines. just one piece of advice, go for it! ! !

text.fr: très bon accueil , l ' hôtesse adelina toujours souriante et vraiment professionnelle . service impeccable avec un personnel toujours proche .
text.en: I come back regularly to Cameroon and to invite my clients or to please myself, the oval is a sure value! ! local or international products, ingenious flavor pairings!

text.fr: super déjeuner ! un buffet avec plein de choix , un accueil au top , les employés étaient au petit soin , surtout léopold , marie , et christelle . je reviendrais ! ! merci à tous
text.en: very generous plate and the only excellent French cuisine in Douala. you get what you pay for. Very very pleasant boss and employees.

text.fr: très bon buffet le dimanche . les serveurs sont très accueillants , en particulier sylvianne et christelle .
text.en: I went to this restaurant 3 times in a row in the same week. I was therefore able to appreciate and get a good idea of ​​this establishment. Each time, we were very well received and the manager of the establishment is always present which makes me say that it is taken seriously. the dishes are perfect with a large choice and especially dishes off the beaten track. the staff lives up to expectations and the service is fast. in short, a beautiful place to invite your business partners but also, without a doubt, to spend a good evening with family if that is the case for you.

text.fr: accueil hors du commun de solange staff très professionnel repas très variés plats local très apprécié j aime aussi la barbe a papa la musique dans l ensemble c est super merci
text.en: with Jerome everything is fine. If you want to eat oysters or other exotic products (made in France) from Douala, this is the place to go. everything is fresh because Jérôme and his wife have put in place precise logistics to satisfy the desires of their most demanding customers. a good address in Douala with a chef who will come and present the menu to you upon your arrival. simple and nice people. in the top ! ! !

text.fr: service de qualité , bon accueil et plats délicieux , musique au top ! ! ! merci à rahab pour la disponibilité !
text.en: I regularly dine at l'ovalie during my missions in Douala. the menu is varied, often with fish of the day; during my last visit I was able to taste an excellent bluefin tuna tartare caught the day before, wonderfully prepared. the dishes are beautifully presented and the service is professional. very friendly boss.

text.fr: belle découverte culinaire ! je me suis régalée . les plats étaient variés et délicieux par la même occasion .
text.en: the reputation of this restaurant is certainly made apart from the setting, the disappointment in the plate, very expensive for what we are offered.

text.fr: se commentaire est adressé aux clients du hilton connaisez vous les conditions dans les dans les quelle travail le personnel du hilton ?
text.en: l'ovalie offers mainly French cuisine, the French chef offers his suggestions and comes to your table during the aperitif (without indicating the prices), beautiful spectacle, but when you receive the bill at the end of the meal, it's a “gulps” assured! the products are good (imported meat), the cuisine is always very salty, like the bill. . the chef is friendly and welcoming, I recommend you go there for the oysters, it's the only place in Douala where you can eat oysters almost all year round, the restaurant receives an arrival every week by air flight - France . . . I rate it average for the quality/price ratio.

text.fr: excellentaccueil de solange tres attentive elle est au top elle maitrise son boulot rien a redire sur la qualite du repas
text.en: a piece of the southwest in the heart of the city, great performance, it was truly a pleasure. A repeat without hesitation .

text.fr: la bouffe est excellente et l ' accueil est cordial . la musique est un peu trop forte et gêne la conversation .
text.en: we feel good there and the team is top notch, excellent food and welcome that lives up to the reputation of the establishment. the suggestions are varied and the boss is always ready to offer you a dream, I recommend the “special” duck breast, ask Jérôme. . . .

text.fr: accueil chaleureux de solange bon service dans l ensemble millieu chaleureux très apprécié et recommandé à tous pour moi c est le top merci pour le staff
text.en: It's a good restaurant, every time I've been there I've loved the food. and the boss is very far from being skimpy in his dishes

text.fr: très bel accueil de solange service de qualité de mari louise staff convivial repas somptueux prompte réaction de tous et toutes
text.en: nowhere else in Cameroon is such care taken in the presentation of dishes and the quality of products. expensive in the evening and very interesting menu at lunchtime.

text.fr: accueil très professionnel et chaleureux . magnifique lieu très beau décor avec un buffet ouvert et un large menu . un personnel serviable et souriant dans un cadre paisible . une cuisine de bonne qualité au goût exquis
text.en: Jerome the chef knows how to introduce us to new flavors. regular arrival of fresh products. The frame is very nice

text.fr: bel accueil de solange très bon repas varié . qualité du service : très poli et souriante . j ’ ai très apprécié et je pense que j ’ y reviendrai encore . vraiment merci
text.en: gourmet dinner, excellent meal, with à la carte service. . . the price is high, but remains in line with the whole.

text.fr: très attrayant . les servantes sont serviable et surtout respectueuse des choses . bien de choses à vo
text.en: This is great cuisine, the dishes are careful, well harmonized, a feast for the eyes, the taste buds and the sense of smell but a huge sacrifice for the pockets, there your pockets will already cry upon entry, but the restaurant has its charm

text.fr: très bon périt déjeuner et attention particulière venant de clotaire qui était vraiment très serviable et aimable
text.en: Western choices are there. lots of delicious dishes of terrestrial or marine origin.

text.fr: super petit déjeuner avec des viennoiseries parfaites . le tout dans un hôtel agréable avec un personnel aux petits soins et plein de bonne humeur .
text.en: It was good, it is no longer in my top list of restaurants in Douala but it is still close. . . the setting is nice but the plates are no longer as beautiful and appetizing as before. . . I had lunch there one afternoon and it was very sad. . . . but hey the meal was ok +. . . . .

text.fr: cuisine de très bonne qualite , variee , bon service de l ' ensemble du personnel et surtout de marie louise .
text.en: dinner: beautiful setting, calm atmosphere, warm welcome from the owner and chef (French), excellent behavior by the waiters. . . a good tasting moment where I will definitely come back!

text.fr: tres tres acceuillante et sourriente l hotesse au nom de solange les mots me manquent pour decrire la beaute des desserts c est ce qu il faut pour un 5 etoiles de luxe merci encore
text.en: ok but too expensive. However, the room had the smell of a closed cellar. . This is what ruined our restaurant moment.

text.fr: qualité des repas et service impeccables . les plats sont très copieux . merci à ivan pour sa gentillesse et son sourire .
text.en: Very warm welcome, nice wine list, very good service, decent decor. for matches in my opinion screen too small. normal addition for Douala

text.fr: buffet du 13 février au safoutier . excellent comme d habitude surtout les entrées et le dessert ainsi que le jus de fruit naturel . excellent service par marie louise qui était toujours à l ' écoute . bon souvenir
text.en: a first attempt at this establishment frequented by a large majority of expatriates did not make me want to come back. I ate there in a room that looked like a canteen because the noise was so disturbing, in a gambling den atmosphere, the smoke extractor being out of service. a fog of tobacco smoke of all kinds hovered in the room! ! ! ! ! ! ! Okay we are in Cameroon where the smoking ban does not apply in public places but how can we enjoy the food served. These dishes still need to arrive at the right temperature on the table and be tasty! warm lobster carpaccio. . . not to mention that evening the quail legs, certainly farm-raised, but having spent too much time in the breeder's freezers before being "put back on our plates". This is the dessert that excited us the most despite the fact that it does not exactly correspond to the menu. . . In short, I would describe this establishment as very average. I really think that the praise and ratings given to him do not reflect reality. I could even think that the reviews are given by friends. . . not to mention the price which seemed exorbitant to us as the quality of the products was lower. Did the chef taste his quails before serving them?

text.fr: le buffet du dimanche est super bon . rien à redire . la table des entrées fait rêver . celle des desserts fait grossir a vue d ' oeil et les plats chauds sont de bonne qualite .
text.en: excellent cuisine, the menu is varied, the setting is super classy, ​​the welcome is very high quality. we are never disappointed either by the welcome or by the food. the bill is often quite steep, it is better to be prepared, but it is worth the effort

text.fr: très bon accueil un personnels souriants et attentif un buffet digne de ce nom nous avons adoré merci
text.en: undoubtedly the best restaurant in Douala. the food is exceptional given the context, however given the prices charged, we did not find a friendly welcome (not to be mean). so over a 12-day stay, we went there once but not twice!

text.fr: bel accueil , une très bonne ambiance , un personnel très émable et un buffet à couper le souffle et très delicieux
text.en: definitely a good restaurant in Douala. Everything we ordered was super good with a beautiful presentation. the service is courteous and professional. However, the prices are excessive. . . so much so that my husband had to leave me to go back to the hotel to get money. expect to spend at least 30 to 35,000 f per person.

text.fr: c est un joyau caché parfait pour un dîné un déjeuner c est vraiment somptueux comme buffet l accueil chaleureux par solange merci vraiment je le recommande à toutes personne qui voudrait découvrir
text.en: very good restaurant, the best gastronomic restaurant in Douala, but who says the best necessarily means not given 45. 000 f the menu or 70 euros, but if you want a meal from a great chef with a tasting menu to make you salivate you will find it here! little tip you also have a menu but only at lunchtime with starter/main course/dessert at 12. 000 f but only at lunchtime from Monday to Friday!

text.fr: buffet dominical varié , fin et copieux . de nouvelles découvertes à chaque fois . une tarte aux fraises à la frangipane particulièrement réussie ce dimanche .
text.en: the epicenter of rugby in Douala. unexpected but very pleasant. the chef produces quality French cuisine and personally ensures the well-being of his customers by providing advice. a good, friendly address.

text.fr: très bon accueil , propreté irréprochable et très bonne qualité des produits , serveurs attentionnés et à l ’ écoute
text.en: always excellent, the menu changes frequently, the welcome and the service are efficient, the bar allows you to have a great time before sitting down to eat. what's on the plate is indicative of quality, well-crafted products. what happiness! continue already

text.fr: restaurant parfait accueil chaleureux merci pour le somptueux repas c est waou ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ça est avec plaisir que je souhaiterai revenir même tout le temps
text.en: setting, refined cuisine, cozy and intimate atmosphere, perfect for a candlelit dinner, with a large and beautiful exhibition of tables for the amateur!

text.fr: je recommande une fois de plus ce restaurant qui contient un grand buffet et plusieurs variétés le personnel aussi est très accueillant je tien a remercier clotaire , sandrine ainsi que larissa qui font vraiment attention aux client et qui sont au petit soins
text.en: a very good address, combining traditional European dishes and creativity. beautiful compositions, wonderful flavors. . . the oval is a favorite.

text.fr: le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet est excellent et varié ( les grands classiques européens et camerounais ) . les amateurs du petit déjeuner typique camerounais ne seront pas déçus : les beignets haricots bouillis y sont très bons . je recommande !
text.en: I dined two or three times at the ovalie. I found the cuisine of the chef, Jérôme, excellent, the welcome and the setting friendly. restaurant of choice for the 'good society' of Douala (mainly expats, the locals being in the minority, at least the times I went there). excellent cuisine for our Western palates, but which may not please your Cameroonian friends (I have had this experience). high prices (if you take wine, count between 50,000 and 60,000 fcfa per person), but given the products worked, this is not surprising. visa card accepted (this avoids having to “carry around” with cash, as is too often the case in Africa).

text.fr: le service est très accueillant , le cadre est confortable et le repas un véritable régal . j ' y reviendrai .
text.en: very good restaurant in Douala, the best. excellent I love eating at l'ovalie.

text.fr: très convivial . buffet très bon . acceuil parfait . service de qualité . j ' ai vraiment passé un bon moment en famille .
text.en: very good restaurant in Douala. warm welcome from the chef who knows how to stir up your wits just by mentioning the dishes. modern cuisine with the price to match, good service. to try, it's a good place for those looking for a little refinement! !

text.fr: bon accueil , personnel agréable et professionnel , espace apaisant avec un groupe musical en live et de bon repas locaux et internationaux .
text.en: I had a good time . the chef surprised me with an explosive trilogy of scallops. followed by roasted prawns with hibiscus petal butter. and to finish, an excellent dessert farandole. To accompany all this, the boss recommends a South African wine. 1st Grand Cru Nederburg. well balanced. I'll let you form your opinion by coming to discover. good trip. . .

text.fr: décor magnifique , accueil chaleureux et repas excellent c ’ est un lieu adéquat pour des déjeuners entre amis ou d ’ affaire et surtout un excellent rapport qualité - prix . fortement recommandé .
text.en: the chef is charming, the room is certainly the prettiest in Douala, with the beauj. he knows how to cook but a little simplicity in the description of the dishes and their preparation would be welcome. quite expensive and wine list boom boom!

text.fr: tres bon buffet : belle entrée simple et légère avec sauce bonne organisation et serveurs accueillants et serieux . merci pour l ’ accueil et la propreté , pas de mouches . que du bonheur !
text.en: I must admit that I love desserts, and when the meal starts very well, continues averagely, and ends very poorly, the disappointment is great. only one experience, but really don't want to go back.

text.fr: j ’ ai beaucoup aimé les plats camerounais et le service est hyper rapide et satisfaisant . je recommande fortement
text.en: very interesting place with a particular French ambiance protocol. the menu is presented by the chef and there are daily menus. My family and I were looking for a nice dinner, but we were disappointed with the food. the menu had no vegetarian options (as we are vegetarians) - and what we were served lacked taste and flavor. it wasn't "special". I would not recommend if you are vegetarian.

text.fr: un très bon accueil , le petit déjeuner est très bon et les serveurs sont toujours très aimables et accueillants .
text.en: the first time I eat at l’ovalie. It’s a gourmet restaurant that offers good quality dishes. the restaurant is ok but nothing extraordinary, personally I will install a wooden floor to give a warm atmosphere, perfect for this type of restaurant. Moreover, if you are hungry, the quantity can be small but quality instead of quantity!

text.fr: très bel accueil par solange convivialité au restaurant très bon plat africain et asiatique star parfait vraiment un seul mot merci
text.en: it's a perfect place for lunch, turnaround and variety. the service, food and quality are consistent owner adds a personal touch

text.fr: accueil super service irréprochable bonne enbiance pointée d une bonne musique pour tout couronner d un bon repas merci encore
text.en: This restaurant was recommended by some of the Americans staying at this hotel, and we were not disappointed. it's very attentive (especially compared to local standards. a great choice of dsily specialties, which all 3 of us had chosen and each evening was as good as what you can find in a large European city. beautiful presentation, and we had the excellent room for the desserts. The prices were about as expensive as at home, but it is worth it we want to have a very high end in Douala.

text.fr: le resto tres conviviale . le personnel accueillant gentil et souriant . merci a larissa et marie louise .
text.en: located in the Bonapriso area, this pleasant restaurant offers European cuisine, thanks to its talented chef. we went there with their friends and we really enjoyed the food. too bad the air conditioning was rather cold. Then, the price is perhaps the most horrible surprise.

text.fr: super bien servi accueil tres chaleureux plats très bien fais je dirais excellent encore merci aux staff en particulier larissa , adeline , marcel , dominique , emmanuel , gilles etc . . .
text.en: We had our dinner here on my boyfriend's birthday and it was much better than I had imagined. the executive chef was very kind and helped me organize a surprise at the end of the meal. the meals were simply perfect. the atmosphere is very relaxing and the decoration is colorful and simply wonderful. the staff was very helpful and kind. the chef was friendly and perfect with suggestions which we tried and really enjoyed. in a word, it's the perfect place to celebrate love

text.fr: bonne accueil , très bon buffet très bon service bref excellent de meilleur met traditionnelle le safoutier c ' est juste excellent
text.en: I had two meals here, one lunch and another meal. The quality of the food is excellent, and I am particularly impressed by the house made smoked salmon and foie gras. the service is top notch too and the owner is extremely attentive to details. It's not cheap but you pay for the quality and service you get from this great place. a place to have a little pleasure perhaps! ?

text.fr: excellent accuei ( super travail christelle ! - ) l , cuisine variée et d ' excellent niveau des entrées au dessert : bravo ! parfait après une bonne journée de travail
text.en: we went there with several friends, there was a pre-determined menu with a choice for starters, main course and dessert. the food was really good, the desert maybe a little too mild for my taste buds. . . the manager was very pleasant and courteous. the service is good. the pleasant decoration. . . and then people started smoking. . . and I cut short my lunch with friends to escape the pollution! !

text.fr: on a passé un très bon moment . de l ' équipe , au repas à l ' ambiance musicale ! on reviendra . très beau cadre
text.en: the food is ok, and an excellent wine choice the owner is very friendly, as are the staff. In total, we were there 10 times in 2 years. From my point of view, the restaurant is overrated, because the quality of the food often doesn't keep up with the price. but in general, fish is excellent, and it is undoubtedly the best choice of meat.

text.fr: le petit déjeuner est impeccable et les serveurs apportent la chaleur au clients vrement il sont a la hauteurs
text.en: we were a group of 10 people for a business dinner. the service was fast and attentive. the food was ok on a world standard, but good for Douala. the wine list was not complete, but worth several French white and red selections.

text.fr: l ' argent ne vaut pas la qualité du service rendu . c ' était merveilleux de déguster les mets d ' ici et d ' ailleurs . nous avons passé un moment inoubliable
text.en: the food is good and the cleanliness of the place. The staff was very kind and helpful . I ate shrimp and it's really very exciting when I think about those moments
